none.$description: No shadow. Used for flat elements like buttons, inputs, and elements that should appear flush with their container.

small.$description: Subtle elevation. Used for cards and containers that need minimal depth separation from background.

default.$description: Standard elevation. Baseline for cards, panels, and standard containers. Provides subtle, elegant depth without overwhelming content. Used for elevated cards. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

large.$description: Prominent elevation. Used for strong cards, modals, dialogs, dropdowns, and floating elements that need clear separation and focus. Optimized for app-default context/theme. Other contexts/themes may override this value.

extra-large.$description: Maximum elevation. Used for high-priority modals, tooltips, and elements that need maximum visual separation and prominence.
